title: Benedict Cumberbatch's Satanic Debut in Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: A Benedict Cumberbatch Satan doesn't seem entirely awful?
Why am I just now noticing Adam's dad's car licence plate was TARDIS backwards
I'd like to point out, that when an actor appears in the last episode of a season, has 4 lines and then is dismissed, that would be a "cameo" and not a "debut."
Benadryl Cucumberpatch is honestly one of my favorite actors
He may have been your father, boy, but he wasn't your daddy.
description:
Who would have thought a 500-foot tall and terrifyingly epic Satan figure can be controlled by a boy? Benedict Cumberbatch voices this creature in the final episode of Good Omens Season One. Watch Good Omens on Prime Video.
